root.name: Track Processor Instant Speed
root.description: display the Instant Speed of tracks for the Track Manager
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 1.0.0.8 Date 2014-06-10 14:13:01
Fix a bug while exporting to xls. If no sequence is active, the TScale is not accessible so the speed computation cannot be performed and the save is cancelled.
- Version 1.0.0.7 Date 2014-06-05 14:34:35
Fix an error that occurred if the sequence displayed is closed and freed during speed computation.
- Version 1.0.0.6 Date 2014-04-01 17:38:04
Now use real sequence scales for speed computation (instead of pixels per frame)
- Version 1.0.0.5 Date 2012-11-15 16:43:15
- Fix a bug when the speed graph is displayed over a sequence and no ROI has been created by the user
- Version 1.0.0.4 Date 2012-10-24 16:34:37
Fixed a display bug
- Version 1.0.0.3 Date 2011-12-07 16:07:39
update to fit with new detection data structure
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2011-10-06 16:21:47
test for general debug
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-09-23 17:23:21
Change: Display legend unselected by default. Fix:Export to XLS Fix:Display of graph over sequences fixed.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-08-25 16:05:07
